item.title: [Python] Get the updated date of the Python Memorandum file.
item.description: ## os.stat I’m writing here about getting time, but I’ll write a little more. Python memo: reference the text and edit the file name while copying the target file >>> os.stat(file_path).st_mtime >>> 1442209206.0 You can get the changed time. But this is only a value. datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp Convert with datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp. >>> datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(os.stat(file_path).st_mtime) datetime.datetime(2015, 9, 14, 14, 40, 6) dt.strftime Then convert it to a character string with dt.strftime and you’re done.
